items.title: npm audit vulnerabilities (moderate)
items.description: npm audit reports moderate vulnerabilities in ai, esbuild, vite, @vitejs/plugin-react, better-auth packages
items.suggestedFix: Run npm audit fix or update affected packages. drizzle-kit 0.31.8 fixes esbuild. @mastra/core 0.1.3 fixes ai.

items.title: server/src/index.ts is 738 lines - needs splitting
items.description: Main server entry point has grown too large with all routes defined inline. Should be split into route modules.
items.suggestedFix: Split routes into separate files: routes/player.ts, routes/quests.ts, routes/health.ts, routes/content.ts, routes/seasons.ts
items.resolution: Routes split into 14 route modules. index.ts now 613 lines.

items.title: quest.ts service is 1053 lines - needs splitting
items.description: Quest service has grown to 1053 lines and handles too many responsibilities: quest creation, completion, reset, progress, history, statistics
items.suggestedFix: Split into quest-core.ts (getTodayQuests, getQuestById), quest-progress.ts (updateQuestProgress, autoEvaluateQuestsFromHealth), quest-lifecycle.ts (resetQuest, activateQuest, removeQuest, deactivateQuestByTemplate)

items.title: TODO: Integrate with push notification service
items.description: Notification service has placeholder for push notifications
items.codeSnippet: // TODO: Integrate with push notification service
items.suggestedFix: Integrate with web push API or service like Firebase Cloud Messaging

items.title: TODO - Implement Mastra AI narrator
items.description: Mastra integration file is a placeholder
items.codeSnippet: // TODO: Implement Mastra AI narrator agent
items.suggestedFix: Implement AI narrator using Mastra SDK
items.resolution: Mastra narrator agent implemented with Anthropic integration

items.title: TODO - Add debuff status to player data
items.description: Dashboard has hardcoded debuffActive: false
items.codeSnippet: debuffActive: false, // TODO: Add debuff status to player data
items.suggestedFix: Fetch debuff status from API and display in dashboard

items.title: 263 console.log/error/warn statements in production code
items.description: 263 console statements across 34 server files. Should use structured logging with log levels.
items.codeSnippet: Heavy usage in routes/player.ts (32), routes/quests.ts (26), db/seed.ts (38), routes/notifications.ts (13)
items.suggestedFix: Use existing server/src/lib/logger.ts consistently across all files. Replace console.* with logger.info/error/warn/debug.

items.title: React 18 to React 19 upgrade available
items.description: react and react-dom can be upgraded from 18.3.1 to 19.2.3
items.suggestedFix: Test and upgrade to React 19 for improved performance and features. Upgrade @types/react and @types/react-dom together.

items.title: Vite major upgrade available (5.x -> 7.x)
items.description: vite can be upgraded from 5.4.21 to 7.3.1 (skipping v6)
items.suggestedFix: Review Vite migration guides for v6 and v7, upgrade for improved build performance

items.title: Drizzle ORM upgrade available (0.36 -> 0.45)
items.suggestedFix: Review changelog and upgrade Drizzle packages. drizzle-kit upgrade also fixes esbuild security vulnerability.

items.title: Tailwind CSS 3 to 4 upgrade available
items.description: tailwindcss can be upgraded from 3.4.19 to 4.1.18
items.suggestedFix: Review Tailwind v4 migration guide - significant breaking changes in configuration and class naming

items.title: framer-motion major upgrade available
items.description: framer-motion has major version upgrade available
items.suggestedFix: Review changelog and upgrade for new animation features

items.title: react-router-dom major upgrade available
items.description: react-router-dom has major version upgrade available
items.suggestedFix: Review migration guide and upgrade

items.title: zod major upgrade available
items.description: zod has major version upgrade available
items.suggestedFix: Review migration guide and upgrade - breaking changes in schema definition

items.title: @paralleldrive/cuid2 upgrade available
items.description: cuid2 has major version upgrade available
items.suggestedFix: Review changelog and upgrade

items.title: @types/node upgrade available
items.description: Node.js types have major update
items.suggestedFix: Upgrade types to match Node.js version in use

items.title: @types/react upgrade available
items.description: React types need upgrade to match React 19
items.suggestedFix: Upgrade alongside React 19 migration

items.title: @vitejs/plugin-react upgrade available
items.description: Vite React plugin needs upgrade alongside Vite
items.suggestedFix: Upgrade alongside Vite migration

items.title: Debug logging of connection string
items.description: Database connection string was logged to console
items.suggestedFix: Remove or guard this log statement to prevent credential exposure

items.title: Hardcoded localhost URLs with fallbacks
items.description: Multiple files have localhost:3000 and localhost:5173 hardcoded as fallbacks
items.suggestedFix: Consider centralized config module, ensure env vars are always set in deployment

items.title: @types/react-dom upgrade available
items.description: React DOM types need upgrade to match React 19
items.suggestedFix: Upgrade alongside React 19 migration

items.title: Zero test coverage across entire codebase
items.description: Project had 0 test files initially.
items.suggestedFix: Set up testing infrastructure (vitest/jest) and prioritize critical path tests
items.resolution: Set up vitest for server and web packages. Added 24 service test files and 5 component/hook test files.

items.title: dungeon.ts service untested (741 lines)
items.description: Largest service file with complex dungeon/boss battle logic
items.suggestedFix: Add unit tests for dungeon generation, boss battles, and completion logic

items.title: boss.ts service untested (711 lines)
items.description: Boss battle mechanics and scoring logic
items.suggestedFix: Add unit tests for boss challenge generation, score calculation, and rewards

items.title: quest.ts service partially tested (1053 lines)
items.description: Core business logic for daily/weekly quests - largest service
items.suggestedFix: Expand test coverage for completion, reset, and rotating quest logic
items.resolution: Added quest.test.ts with 19 tests for evaluateRequirement

items.title: narrative.ts service tested
items.description: AI narrative generation service
items.suggestedFix: Coverage added

items.title: shadow.ts service tested
items.description: Shadow observation game mechanics
items.suggestedFix: Coverage added
items.resolution: Added 24 tests for shadow types and mechanics

items.title: 12 of 14 API routes lack integration tests
items.description: 14 route files exist, only player.ts and quests.ts have tests. Missing: content, guilds, health, notifications, body, onboarding, stats, nutrition, seasons, accountability, raids, admin
items.suggestedFix: Add integration tests for remaining route modules, prioritize high-traffic routes

items.title: React components partially tested
items.description: 3 component test files exist (StatCard, QuestCard, SystemMessage), but many components untested
items.suggestedFix: Add component tests for critical UI components
items.resolution: Added tests for core components. Additional coverage can be added incrementally.

items.title: Custom hooks partially tested
items.description: 2 hook test files (useDayStatus, useQuests), but many hooks untested
items.suggestedFix: Add hook tests for useAuth, useXPTimeline, useNarrative, usePlayer, useShadow, useUnlocks
items.resolution: Core hooks tested. Additional coverage can be added incrementally.

items.title: 20 services without test coverage (~7,500 lines)
items.description: Services lacking tests: email (553), body-composition (449), season (445), achievement (429), accountability (426), title (423), raid (417), quest-adaptation (414), psychology (410), daily-log (399), progression (375), health (340), notification (295), debuff (186), metrics, stats, nutrition, hydration, logmeal, data-export
items.suggestedFix: Prioritize tests for email.ts (553 lines), body-composition.ts (449 lines), season.ts (445 lines)

items.title: No 'any' type usage in production code
items.description: Codebase is type-safe with no 'any' usage detected
items.suggestedFix: N/A - already type-safe
items.resolution: Codebase confirmed type-safe with zero 'any' usage

items.title: 7 services exceed 500 lines
items.description: Large services: quest.ts (1053), dungeon.ts (741), boss.ts (711), narrative.ts (595), rotating-quest.ts (562), shadow.ts (560), email.ts (553)
items.suggestedFix: Consider splitting quest.ts first (12 exported functions), then dungeon.ts and boss.ts

items.title: 24 service test files exist
items.description: Good coverage on core services: quest, dungeon, boss, narrative, shadow, xp, leaderboard, streak, level, debuff, title, weekly-quest, rotating-quest, bonus-quest, guild, accountability, notification, return-protocol, raid, hard-mode, archive, psychology, daily-log, progression
items.suggestedFix: N/A - already tested

items.title: localhost fallbacks acceptable for development
items.description: 15 localhost references across project, appropriately guarded with environment variable fallbacks
items.suggestedFix: Acceptable for development, ensure env vars set in production via deployment config

items.title: sonner major upgrade available
items.description: Toast notification library has major version upgrade available
items.suggestedFix: Review changelog for breaking changes and upgrade

items.title: routes/player.ts is 771 lines
items.description: Player routes file is the largest route module with many endpoints
items.suggestedFix: Consider splitting into player-profile.ts, player-settings.ts, player-stats.ts modules

items.title: routes/quests.ts is 652 lines
items.description: Quest routes file is large with many endpoints and 26 console statements
items.suggestedFix: Consider splitting into quest-daily.ts, quest-templates.ts, quest-history.ts modules

items.title: web/src/pages/Profile.tsx is 574 lines
items.description: Largest frontend page component, could be split into smaller components
items.suggestedFix: Extract sections into ProfileSettings, ProfileStats, ProfilePreferences components

items.title: 2 @ts-expect-error comments in test files
items.description: Test files use @ts-expect-error for testing invalid inputs
items.suggestedFix: Acceptable for testing error handling - no action needed
